title: Naruto Uzumaki Chronicles 2 .RAW Files [PS2]
content:
I'm have been trying to mod these game for years, but I still stuck with the raw files from RACJIN games, [same case as Fullmetal Alchemist & Bleach]. The files appear to be compressed, and a signature scan using binwalk does not return any results. Here is the entropy scan of one of the files:

Moreover, a hex dump of the first few bytes in the file do not reveal any obvious header structure: 

$ hexdump -C -n 256 000001a6_5835296_6.raw 
00000000  00 05 00 ff cd 14 20 58  80 03 02 04 04 b8 20 20  |...... X......  |
00000010  00 90 c0 99 02 18 20 10  a0 00 84 01 13 00 76 0a  |...... .......v.|
00000020  70 c0 40 80 01 20 a0 3e  08 10 08 e2 a7 00 07 10  |p.@.. .>........|
00000030  04 18 00 b0 ec 80 00 c0  c3 bc 0a 70 40 41 80 7a  |...........p@A.z|
00000040  4c 02 04 80 61 3c 56 80  03 16 02 0c b0 81 26 42  |L...a...H..|
000000d0  40 5e 0d 00 f4 6a 00 e8  a0 23 80 07 7d 22 12 4c  |@^...j...#..}".L|
000000e0  f3 05 20 96 05 08 00 66  d9 00 f0 41 47 00 10 ba  |.. ....f...AG...|
000000f0  23 80 2f 40 cd 17 80 be  16 20 00 68 6b 03 40 0c  |#./@..... .hk.@.|
00000100

Raw Files https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_LD5uCWewHncJLRlHR-X0_Zh0h7qTvFl/view

I would like to identify the compression algorithm used to compress these files so that they can be decompressed and analyzed.
